title: Eco-Friendly Modern Family House near Ustka Port District
description:
Welcome to this beautifully designed, eco-conscious 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom house in the tranquil Port District of Ustka. The home gives you an impressive 148 square meters of living space, flooded with natural sunlight thanks to floor-to-ceiling windows. Meticulously planned, it features three generously sized bedrooms, spacious open-plan living areas, and ample built-in storage spaces.

Enjoy the fresh coastal breeze from your private garden, ideal for family gatherings and play. This is the perfect blend of modern utility and serene relaxation.
neighborhood_description: Nestled within Ustka’s Port District, the property has a peaceful suburban vibe with access to invigorating bike paths leading through the local pine forests and towards the Baltic Sea. The area is family-oriented with shopping and dining nearby, while still maintaining a sense of calm away from the urban bustle. Commuting is breeze with convenient highway access, connecting you swiftly to city amenities and holiday attractions.
lifestyle_benefits: safe area for children to play
target_buyer: Eco-conscious families with children who value spacious, modern living in a friendly, low-density neighborhood close to nature and vital amenities, and appreciate sustainability and healthy lifestyles.
market_positioning: Positioned as a premium yet attainable family home, this property stands out in Ustka’s housing market for its modern eco-features, flexible living space, and proximity to both natural surroundings and town conveniences. Tailored for families prioritizing safety, tranquility, and active lifestyles.
